io.atomix.core.set

Interface AsyncDistributedSet<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - set entry type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncDistributedCollection<E>, AsyncIterable<E>, AsyncPrimitive, DistributedPrimitive, Transactional<io.atomix.core.set.impl.SetUpdate<E>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncDistributedNavigableSet<E>, AsyncDistributedSortedSet<E>

    public interface AsyncDistributedSet<E>
extends AsyncDistributedCollection<E>, Transactional<io.atomix.core.set.impl.SetUpdate<E>>
    A distributed collection designed for holding unique elements.

    All methods of AsyncDistributedSet immediately return a future. The returned future will be completed when the operation completes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.atomix.primitive.DistributedPrimitive
